study.patient_selection: Adults suspected of having pulmonary embolism Consecutive enrollment Mean age 51.7 years
study.index_test: Computed tomographic pulmonary angiography 4 though 16 rows of detectors Interpreted by two independent radiologists who were from centers other than that at which the image was obtained Positive readings required both radiologists to agree on a defect in at least one lobe
study.reference_standard: Conventional pulmonary angiography Interpreted by two independent radiologists who were from centers other than that at which the image was obtained Positive readings required both radiologists to agree on a defect in at least one lobe
study.flow_timing: The index test preceded the reference test by within 36 hours
